reviews.isabelle: I did the 12-days Manaslu circuit trekking, and it was absolutely spectacular! Stunning views, truly a memory for life. Sandip is an amazing guide...
reviews.samuel: We just completed the Annapurna Circuit with Tilicho Lake. Sandip was incredible! Every guesthouse exceeded our expectations. He paced the trek perfectly...
reviews.lisa: The Annapurna Circuit was truly once-in-a-lifetime! Sandip made everything smooth and memorable. He knows so much about the area and always put our safety first...
reviews.michael: The Everest Base Camp trek was the adventure of a lifetime! Sandip's knowledge of the Khumbu region is exceptional and he shared incredible stories...
reviews.anna: Standing at Everest Base Camp was surreal! Sandip made sure we were well-prepared and safe. The teahouses were cozy, views breathtaking...
reviews.david: Everest Base Camp exceeded every expectation! Sandip's attention to detail made all the difference. From Namche Bazaar to Kala Patthar, unforgettable...

about.title: Who we are
about.subtitle: Connecting travelers with passionate local guides for authentic adventures around the world.
about.storyP1: Zamzam Experience was born from a simple observation: around the world, talented local guides are passionate about sharing their culture and activities, but struggle to connect with travelers in a fair and equitable way.
about.storyP2: We're building a new kind of travel agency – one that puts local communities first, ensures fair compensation for guides and partners, and delivers authentic experiences that benefit everyone involved.
about.storyP3: Every adventure we offer creates meaningful connections, supports sustainable tourism, and helps preserve the destinations we love exploring.
about.authenticDesc: Every adventure is designed and led by locals who share their genuine culture, stories, and perspectives.
about.ecoDesc: We minimize environmental impact, respect local cultures, and ensure tourism benefits communities long-term.
about.fairDesc: Our partners receive fair compensation for their work. We believe in equitable tourism that benefits everyone.
about.pricesDesc: Quality experiences at fair prices. We hate tourist traps - you pay what's right for quality service.

founder.title: Founder
founder.name: Timothy Alcaide
founder.bio1: I'm a software engineer who quit my job in 2024 to travel the world. Passionate about adventure sports and mountains, I explored Madagascar, Thailand, Vietnam, Nepal, and Morocco.
founder.bio2: Everywhere I went, I met incredible local guides who were passionate about their craft but struggled to find clients fairly. That's why I created Zamzam Experience in 2025.
founder.bio3: (Fun fact: "zamzam" is a Nepali word meaning "let's go!" – it perfectly captures our spirit of adventure.)

partners.title: Our local partners
partners.subtitle: We work exclusively with passionate local guides, family-run accommodations, and small businesses. When you travel with us, you're directly supporting the people who call these places home.
partners.guidesDesc: Passionate professionals who know every trail, wave, and hidden gem in their region.
partners.businessDesc: Family-run operations that provide authentic accommodations and services.
partners.communityDesc: Cooperatives and organizations dedicated to sustainable, community-based tourism.

commitment.title: Our commitment to fair tourism
commitment.subtitle: Tourism should benefit everyone, especially local communities
commitment.fairRemDesc: All our partners receive fair compensation for their services. We believe in equitable partnerships where everyone benefits.
commitment.communityDesc: We prioritize working with local businesses and family-run operations, ensuring tourism revenue stays within the community.
commitment.envDesc: We operate carbon-neutral adventures, participate in trail maintenance, and educate travelers on Leave No Trace principles.
commitment.inclusiveDesc: We're committed to working with diverse partners and supporting inclusive tourism. As we grow, we aim to create more opportunities for underrepresented groups in adventure tourism.
